      • blownShips

        public static int blownShips(java.lang.String[][] foe,
             int[][][] ships,
             int x)
        Checks if a whole ship has been shot to notify of the event (enemy).
        Parameters:
        foe - the enemy's table.
        ships - the enemy's ships.
        x - the number of the ship.
        Returns:
        either '5' to mark as destroyed or the same number as given.
